data.text:
Katy Perry's outstanding character is that of sympathy, mingled with hospitality. Katy Perry have a great urge to make others a little happier for having met Katy Perry. No higher quality could be possessed than this but it is one that may be carried to excess. Katy Perry spend lot of time and money for the sake of others.Katy Perry's tastes are of a cultured order and, at heart, Katy Perry have a love for literary and artistic work of a high grade, though the commercial existence, which Katy Perry must probably follow, may force them out of sight.Regarding money, Katy Perry have peculiar views. At times Katy Perry deny Katy Perry'sself legitimate necessaries and at others, Katy Perry spend somewhat recklessly. Katy Perry will always give in response to the call of charity. On some occasions, Katy Perry put Katy Perry'sself to considerable trouble in order to save a few rupees on the price of an article Katy Perry desire to purchase.Katy Perry's chief weakness is that Katy Perry are somewhat easily impressed. In fact, Katy Perry believe too much of what Katy Perry hear. Unscrupulous people are quick to notice this defect in Katy Perry and they are certain to trade it sooner or later. Therefore, be on Katy Perry's guard and avoid being victimised by someone who may come to Katy Perry in the guise of a friend.

Katy Perry are a person who live in fantasy. Hypersensitive, many of Katy Perry have inferiority complexes, feeling slighted by taking the most unrelated incident as personal insult. It is important that Katy Perry do not indulge in drugs or alcohol, for this adds to Katy Perry's unclarity. Katy Perry be honest with Katy Perry'sself and others, and attempt to be as realistic as possible, for Katy Perry tend toward escapism. Music, colours and nature are very positive in smoothing Katy Perry's overly sensitive being.Katy Perry are a sensible person by nature, which will also help Katy Perry to handle various situations in life. Katy Perry are likely to experience obstacles in Katy Perry's studies but will face each and every situation without succumbing to fear. Katy Perry's urge to acquire more and more knowledge will help Katy Perry climb the ladder of success. In the initial phase of Katy Perry's life, Katy Perry may encounter certain difficulties, but Katy Perry will prove to be lucky in Katy Perry's studies solely because of Katy Perry's concentration skills. Sometimes, Katy Perry may find it difficult to remember certain things, but thinking hard during such time can make everything crystal clear. This aspect of Katy Perry's character will help Katy Perry to succeed in the realm of Katy Perry's studies.
